Reviews.Title: will never buy sanyo again
Reviews.Author: Dennis Mitchell
Reviews.Content: purchased in NOV 2012  3 months later it goes off and will not come back ontried chat with sanyo customer service but did not work ---twice

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: ambi083
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this TV for us in July of 2010.  We have had several Sanyos for different rooms throughout the house over the years and feel it is a good brand for the (generally less expensive) price.  Picture and sound are both decent, and we love the ability to use our laptop/tablet/phones using HDMI cables and Xbox 360 with the other hookup!  Although after 2 years it did start an annoying habit of randomly shutting off and restarting itself.  It doesn't do it often, just enough to make you think someone is messing with you or you sat on the remote or something...  Overall it has been very worth the cost, though.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on Sanyo products.
Reviews.Author: KIM PILGRIM
Reviews.Content: Had television just over one year with very limited use.  Was watching and it cut itself off.  Tried turning it back on and saw picture for a couple of seconds, then heard a weird  pulsating sound.  I turned it off and it will not turn back on.  Sanyo is crap!!!!

Reviews.Title: damaged equipment
Reviews.Author: diana lopez
Reviews.Content: Sincerely, this is to inform you that after getting it set it on tv and after a while of use the image is damaged, we followed the instructions of the manual and the picture did not improve.

ProductInfo.Features:
Integrated ATSC Digital and NTSC Analog Tuner (Digital Clear QAM capable)
High gloss black finish it blends into the background when the lights are dimmed for your movies, sports and favorite programs in your den or living room.
Full array of HDMI, Component A/V, Composite A/V, & RF inputs, and a coaxial digital audio output.
Wide Viewing Angles:178 H x 178 V Degrees
Energy Star Qualified
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo DP42841 42" LCD 1080p 60Hz HDTV
